conbody.p: listening modeIn this mode the teacher can listen to a student's microphone without alerting the student. Select Listen from the student pop-up menu (see section ) to enable this mode.
A headset icon ( ) will appear on the student panel in listening mode.
The whole conversation will be heard if the student is having a conversation with another student.
Please see section for listening to a group conversation in Discussion mode.
Select Listen from the student pop-up menu (see section ) again to exit the listening mode.
